title: While Loop Quiz Game
description: Create a program that uses a while loop to simulate a quiz game, where the user can answer questions until they choose to quit.
sample_input:
What is the capital of France?
Paris
What is the largest planet in our solar system?
Jupiter
quit
sample_output:
Correct!
What is the next question?
Correct!
Do you want to answer another question? (yes/no)
